title: How Does Music Move Us?
description: We're turning things around! Instead of you sending us the question, this time we're asking the question and looking to you for some answers. We wanted to explore why music moves us.
itunes:subtitle: We're turning things around! Instead of you sending us the question, this time we're asking the question and looking to you for some answers. We wanted to explore why music moves us.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
itunes:author: Vermont Public Radio
